title: Filipina Client Outreach & Tele-Sales Specialist (Work-from-Home, UAE Time Zone)
job_overview:
???? Why Join Us?
We’re a fast-growing UAE digital-commerce agency helping local companies build their websites, e-commerce stores, and marketing funnels. You’ll be the friendly voice that introduces our services to business owners, sets appointments, and nurtures warm leads—critical work that directly drives company growth.

???? Key Responsibilities
% Task
50 % Outbound calling to UAE prospects (data & scripts provided) to introduce our service bundle and secure discovery calls with Shoaib.
20 % WhatsApp & email follow-ups: send our bilingual proposal message (English + Arabic) and track responses.
15 % CRM updates: log call notes, lead status, and next-action dates in HubSpot/Google Sheets.
10 % Inbound call handling: answer basic service questions and book calendar slots.
5 % Weekly summary reports on call volumes, appointments booked, and pipeline feedback.

???? Minimum Requirements
Female Filipino residing in the Philippines (cultural fit for OnlineJobs.ph talent pool).

Excellent spoken & written English; clear, confident phone presence.

Stable 25 Mbps+ internet, backup data connection, quiet workspace, noise-canceling headset.

1-year+ experience in tele-sales, customer service, or virtual assistant roles.

Comfortable working night shift (PH) to match UAE daytime.

Basic Google Workspace & CRM familiarity.

Self-starter: hits daily call targets, organizes follow-ups without micromanagement.

Nice-to-Have
Familiarity with GCC culture or Arabic greetings.

Experience selling digital services (web dev, SEO, social media, e-commerce).

Knowledge of Amazon / Noon / Shopify ecosystems.

???? What You’ll Get
Fixed monthly salary paid via Wise on time—every time.

Performance bonuses for each qualified meeting + closed deal.

Hands-on training: scripts, rebuttal guides, product knowledge.

Direct mentorship from the founder & weekly coaching huddles.

Philippine holidays respected (plus UAE Eid breaks).

100 % remote—save on commute, work with a supportive, faith-friendly team.

???? How to Apply
Subject line: Tele-Sales Specialist – [Your Name]

Send to Upgrade to see actual info with:

A short voice recording (60-90 sec) introducing yourself & why you’re perfect for this role.

Updated résumé (PDF).

Screenshot of internet speed test.

Earliest start date & salary expectation.

Complete our short Google Form that you’ll receive by reply.

Applications without a voice sample will not be considered.

? Sample Opening Script You’ll Master
“Assalamu Alaikum! May I speak with the owner or marketing manager?
My name is [Your Name] calling on behalf of Maverick E Lounge here in the UAE.
We recently helped a Sharjah contractor boost their online presence with a new bilingual website, social media, and lead-gen ads—results they loved!
I’d love to book you a free 20-minute consultation to see if we can do the same for your company.
Does tomorrow at 11 AM work for you?”

???? We respect your time and talent—only shortlisted candidates will be contacted within 7 days.
Looking forward to welcoming the next superstar to our growing family!

Jazak Allah khair / Maraming salamat!
